emails.subject: Re: Traci Bonfiglio - Wedding 360 Booth
emails.context:
Event Type: Wedding
Date: 03/19/2027
Time: 5pm-8pm
Venue: Las Vegas
Guests: 50-200
Budget: $1,000 - $2,000
Package: 360 BOOTH
Source: Search Engine
emails.draft:
Hey Traci,

Thanks for reaching out about your upcoming wedding!  I've put together a quote for you here: KANDE QUOTE
It includes our 360 Photo Booth.  The quote is dynamic and will adjust pricing based on the items you add to it.

Las Vegas weddings are always a blast — the 360 Booth creates those amazing slow-motion videos your guests will be sharing for weeks.  With your March 2027 date, you've got plenty of time to plan, but we do book up fast for spring weddings.

Let me know if you have any questions?

emails.subject: Re: Kande Photo Booths - Your Signed Contract
emails.context:
THEIR LAST MESSAGE:
"Hi Kurtis, Seems there are no barriers to enter the Piccino Presidio restaurant."
[Attached AI-generated image showing venue entrance]

---
YOU ASKED:
"RE: stairs - could you confirm if there are stairs? We have a bunch of heavy hardcases and can't move them up stairs unless there are venue staff that help us."
emails.draft:
Hey Madison,

Perfect, thanks for confirming!  No stairs works great for us — we'll have no issues getting our gear in.

We're all set for the 15th.  Looking forward to it!

emails.subject: Re: Kande Photo Booths rental follow up
emails.context:
THEIR LAST MESSAGE:
"I am unsure, we are collaborating with two other orgs for our booth, and I just offered to check back to see if this is the best we can do. I don't know what they were thinking this might cost, I can ask if there is a number in mind. I'm just doing the busy work, not actually attending this show."

---
YOU ASKED:
About pricing/budget for their event
emails.draft:
Hey Sarah,

Totally understand — happy to work with whatever budget the group has in mind.  If they can share a target number, I can put together a custom package that fits.

Just let me know what they're thinking and we'll make it work!

message: Email sync requires the local agent (gog CLI). Emails can be pushed manually via POST /api/inbox/refresh.
